content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: grindstone
inventory=[{"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 48, "index": 20}, {"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "mutton", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 26}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 30}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 9, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 43}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a grindstone, I need to place 2 sticks and a stone slab in a specific configuration. I will first move the spruce_wood into the crafting grid to craft the planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: grindstone
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 48, "index": 20}, {"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "mutton", "quantity": 18, "index": 25}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 64, "index": 26}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 30}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 9, "index": 35}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 53, "index": 43}]
thought: I have now crafted the spruce planks. I will move the planks to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
